EmailTemplate.name: Notify Pending Action - Purchase Card
EmailTemplate.subject: Purchase Card Provisioning Action for {!Forms__c.RecordType} Assigned
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A purchase card provisioning action has been requested and has been assigned to {!Forms__c.Assigned_to__c} for completion. To review information regarding this action please click on the link below.
{!Forms__c.RecordType} Link: {!Forms__c.Link}
